Parameters.Name: MEDIA-3-3-15 AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check Audio Encoder Configuration use count when removing profile with Audio Encoder Configuration

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Wrong UseCount
Test.Description: Check Audio Encoder Configuration use count when deleting profile with Audio Encoder Configuration when UseCount value is not decreased by 1 after deleting profile with Audio Encoder Configuration from profile

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct fault (not fixed Profile exists)
Test.Description: Check Audio Encoder Configuration use count when deleting profile Audio Encoder Configuration when DUT returns Action/MaxNVTProfiles on CreateProfile and not fixed Profile exists

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct fault (all Profiles are fixed)
Test.Description: Check Audio Encoder Configuration use count when deleting profile with Audio Encoder Configuration when DUT returns Action/MaxNVTProfiles on CreateProfile and all Profiles are fixed

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: No compatible AECs

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (DELETION PROFILE WITH ENCODER CONFIGURATION)
Test.Name: Correct response (find compatible AEC with 2nd attempt)
